Package step.framework.extensions

Interface Summary
ExtensionListener When properly configured, an extension listener can be used to perform additional resource initialization and destruction related to its extension.
Interceptor This interface is the super-type of all interceptor interfaces.
ServiceInterceptor This interface specifies the methods an extension's service interceptor must implement to intercep service execution.
WebServiceInterceptor This interface specifies the methods an extension's web service interceptor must implement to intercept web service messages.
 

Class Summary
Extension Each Extension object represents a configured extension instance.
ExtensionEngine The Extension Engine is a singleton object that represents the framework's extension engine.
ExtensionListenerParameter An instance of this class is provided as parameter to each extension listener and enables it to access configuration and context data.
Handler JAX-WS SOAP Handler that intercepts web service message flow and calls web service interceptor manager to invoke interceptors.
InterceptorParameter An instance of a subclass of this class is provided as parameter to each interceptor and enables it to access configuration and context data.
ServiceInterceptorBase This abstract class provides a default implementation for Service interceptor methods.
ServiceInterceptorManager An instance of this class is responsible for interceping service execution (before and after it happens) invoking all configured extension service interceptors.
ServiceInterceptorParameter An instance of this class is provided as parameter to each service interceptor and enables it to access configuration and context data.
WebServiceInterceptorBase This abstract class provides friendlier intercept methods for a Web Service interceptor.
WebServiceInterceptorBaseClient This abstract class provides friendlier intercept methods for a client-side Web Service interceptor.
WebServiceInterceptorBaseServer This abstract class provides friendlier intercept methods for a server-side Web Service interceptor.
WebServiceInterceptorManager An instance of this class is responsible for interceping web service messages (inbound and outbound) invoking all configured extension web service interceptors.
WebServiceInterceptorParameter An instance of this class is provided as parameter to each web service interceptor and enables it to access configuration and context data.
 

Exception Summary
ExtensionEngineException This exception is thrown when the extension engine has some problem that it wants to report.
ExtensionException This exception is thrown when an extension has some problem that it wants to report.
InterceptorException This exception is the base type for interceptor exceptions.
ServiceInterceptorException This exception is thrown when a service interceptor has some problem that it wants to report.
WebServiceInterceptorException This exception is thrown when a web service interceptor has some problem that it wants to report.
